mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_daynote (user_id, title, description, date, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{date}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_daynote SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date = #{date}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_daynote WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date = #{date}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, title, description, date, created_at, updated_at FROM user_daynote WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND date BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY date ASC
